directions: Place lentils in a saucepan. Add enough water to cover by 1 inch. Bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, until lentils are tender but not mushy, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain.
Combine lentils, apples, carrot, chives, and parsley in a bowl. Stir together olive oil, vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper in a cup and pour over lentil mixture. Mix and serve.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or more to taste
1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Vegan Lentil Salad with Apples and Carrot
